Package hero.core.algorithm.metaheuristic.ge

Class SimpleGrammaticalEvolution_example

java.lang.Object
hero.core.problem.Problem<Variable<java.lang.Integer>>
hero.core.algorithm.metaheuristic.moge.AbstractProblemGE
hero.core.algorithm.metaheuristic.ge.SimpleGrammaticalEvolution_example
public class SimpleGrammaticalEvolution_example
extends AbstractProblemGE
Example Please note that using the Script Engine is too slow. We recommend using an external evaluation library like JEval (sourceforge).
Author:
José Luis Risco Martín
